bibl.title: Ancient Faces. Mummy Portraits from Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: 1 front. coul., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul., 1 carte.
This volume also serves as Part IV of: A Catalogue of Roman Portraits in the British Museum. - 6 essays and a catalogue.
WALKER Susan and Morris BIERBRIER, with Paul ROBERTS and John TAYLOR (Edd.), Ancient Faces. Mummy Portraits from Roman Egypt.
London, British Museum Press, 1997, 4Â°, 224 pp., 1 front. coul., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul., 1 carte. ISBN 0-7141-1905-9 (hbk) / 0-7141-0989-4 (pbk).
